about_the_game:
Your Friend Is A Bad Apple, is a horror-comedy survival game, you're desperately trying to make things right by traversing Brink's warped, fruit-themed dreamworld. However, it won’t be easy. Brink’s subconscious has turned into a hostile environment filled with menacing party animals, deformed grandmas, and friends with twisted, malicious grins. To make matters worse, Brink, the "Bad Apple," roams the nightmare in search of you, furious that you didn’t show up for their big day.

Key Features:

-Dark Humor Meets Psychological Horror: A blend of comedic absurdity and unnerving horror as you navigate Brink's mind, where everything seems to be a twisted joke at your expense.

-Power & Survival Mechanics: Avoid the wrath of Brink, the "Bad Apple," as they hunt you down through eerie environments. Use your powers and strategy to stay one step ahead of the monstrous party guests.

-Procedural Map Generation- Have a different experience every time you enter a part of Brink's Memory unware of what you might find!

This nightmare is ripe for exploring, but beware—your friendship is the only thing that might save you from being trapped in this twisted world. Will you mend what’s broken, or will Brink’s bitterness spoil everything?
